param.name: pdwFlag
param.para: A pointer to a value that will hold the current option flag when the method returns. This can be a combination of the following values.
Enumerate only items that are part of the file system. Do not enumerate items contained by virtual folders.
Enumerate only the file system directories, UNC shares, and UNC servers.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM error value otherwise.

param.name: dwFlag
param.para: New option flags. Use these flags to ask the client to include the names of the files and subfolders of the specified folders the next time the client's interface is called. This parameter can contain one or more of the following flags.
Enumerate only those items that are part of the file system. Do not enumerate items contained by virtual folders.
Enumerate only the file system directories, UNC shares, and UNC servers.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM error value otherwise.

summary.para: Extends the interface to enable clients of an autocomplete object to retrieve and set option flags.

remarks.para: This interface also provides the methods of the interface from which it inherits.

clients implement this interface to enable the autocomplete object to retrieve and set options. The options are basically a request that the client generate a list with the names of all the files and subfolders contained by one or more specified folders. The autocomplete object then calls the client's interface to request the strings.
Typically, this interface is not used directly by applications.
